instructions.title: Install Dependencies
instructions.description:
In your project root, run npm install --save react-redux 
npm install —save redux 
npm install —save redux-thunk

instructions.title: Create Folder Structure
instructions.description: In your project root create an 'app' folder. In the app folder create an 'actions' folder , a 'reducers' folder and a 'components' folder.

instructions.title: Create your first action
instructions.description:
The action is a basic function called from the component whenever we want the whole state of the app to be changed. Our action creator is a simple function returning an object (the action itself)with a type attribute expressing what happened with the app.
In your actions folder create a js file 'index.js'
